resources.string: FloatingMusicActionButton by Tim Rijckaert (github); AndroidMaterialPreferences by Michael Rapp (github)
Adjust the frequency of the side tone.
Typically this is around 700 to 800 hertz. Adjust this if you have difficulty recognizing characters or if you want to keep fresh.
Start with the words per minute you want to achieve. Resist the temptation to lower it if you cant copy every character, just keep at it!
